titleStmt.title: The gadding tribe reproved by the light of the Scriptures. Wherin the true Protestants are encouraged to hold fast their Christian profession, maugre the Beast (i.e.) the pope; or the image of the Beast (i.e.) the Quakers, and their followers: to whom is given a mouth to speak great things. / By George Willington, schoolmaster in the city of Bristoll.
titleStmt.author: Willington, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Hunt for the Author.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
